alert.note: Alert for Cortland; Tompkins (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 22 at 5:50PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Cortland and northeastern Tompkins Counties through 615 PM EDT... At 550 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Ithaca, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Ithaca, Cortland, Cayuga Heights, Lansing, Homer, Virgil, Groton, Dryden, Freeville and South Cortland. This includes the following highway exits... New York Interstate 81 between 11 and 12. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
